data.eml:eml: Catalogue of the type specimens deposited in the Mollusca Collection of the Museu Nacional / UFRJ, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pimenta, Alexandre Dias, Monteiro, Júlio César, Barbosa, André Favaretto, Salgado, Norma Campos, Coelho, Arnaldo Campos Dos Santos (2014): Catalogue of the type specimens deposited in the Mollusca Collection of the Museu Nacional / UFRJ, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Zootaxa 3780 (1): 51-107, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3780.1.3
